mapper.select: select id, file_hash as hash, file_name from system_file where file_hash = #{fileHash}

SELECT f.id, f.file_name, f.file_type,f.file_path,f.upload_date,u.nickname as uploadPerson,f.file_tag from entity_file_relation r LEFT JOIN system_file f on f.id = r.file_id LEFT JOIN system_user u on u.id = f.user_id where r.entity_id = #{entityId}
